Query.Sentence: WITH ENABLED_CHECKER AS ( SELECT P.*,B.BRA_NAME, COALESCE(PRO_SALE, PRO_PRICE) AS PRO_REAL_PRICE, COALESCE (((PRO_PRICE - PRO_SALE) / PRO_PRICE) * 100, 0) AS DISCOUNT FROM ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS_WITH_OFFER AS P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.BRANDS AS B ON P.BRA_ID = B.BRA_ID WHERE PRO_ENABLED = TRUE ) SELECT DISTINCT #COLUMNS# FROM ENABLED_CHECKER INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.PRO_GENDER AS G ON ENABLED_CHECKER.PGE_ID = G.PGE_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.CATEGORIES AS C ON ENABLED_CHECKER.CAT_ID = C.CAT_ID LEFT JOIN ${mainschema}.product_skin ps ON ps.pro_id = ENABLED_CHECKER.pro_id LEFT JOIN ${mainschema}.skin_types st ON st.skin_id = ps.skin_id #WHERE#

WITH complete_overview AS ( SELECT *, COALESCE (((pro_price - pro_sale) / pro_price) * 100, 0) AS DISCOUNT, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS ol WHERE ol.pro_id = p.pro_id ) AS AMMOUNT_OF_SALES FROM ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS_WITH_OFFER AS p WHERE pro_enabled = TRUE ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM complete_overview #WHERE# #ORDER#

WITH SALES AS ( SELECT SUM(OL.OL_UNITS) AS TOTAL_SALES,DATE(O.ORD_DATE) AS SALES_DATE,P.* FROM ${mainschema}.PRODUCTS AS P INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.ORD_LINES AS OL ON OL.PRO_ID = P.PRO_ID INNER JOIN ${mainschema}.ORDERS AS O ON O.ORD_ID = OL.ORD_ID GROUP BY P.PRO_ID,DATE(O.ORD_DATE) ) SELECT #COLUMNS# FROM SALES S LEFT JOIN ${mainschema}.PRODUCT_SKIN PS ON PS.PRO_ID = S.PRO_ID #WHERE# #ORDER#
